Pregnancy Categories 
Category Definition 
A Adequate and well-controlled (AWC) studies in pregnant women have 
failed to demonstrate a risk to the fetus in the first trimester of pregnancy 
(and there is no evidence of a risk in later trimesters) 
 
B Animal reproduction studies have failed to demonstrate a risk to the fetus
